title: 3-3 in placements
body: Still getting golds and plats from last season in game. Hoping that means my mmr isnt getting tanked hard. Was G5 with some lp last season. Hopefully i can win the rest lol. Id be happy with s3+

replies.body:
went 2-8 in my placement, Bronze 1 lol.

Was surprised it wasnt B5.
Silver 2 not bad of a drop went 5-5
I was G3, went 3-7 placements, got S3. Good luck!

I was gold 4 at the end of last season, and ended up 7-3 in placements, getting matched with mostly gold bordered folks with the occasional plat border (and occasional silver border), and was placed S3, so theres plenty of hope for you to manage S3 yourself, and probably at least be spared from bronze even if it all goes pear shaped from here.

Just climbed out of s2 this week 
Plat last season 

But hey skipped a division woo and now I'm gold 3

Never give up there's hope
